Name: Astonia Remastered
About the game: For more gameplay video's and guides, check out: Join our discord channel to get some tips: Astonia Remastered is a free classic fantasy MMORPG. Now featuring remastered graphics and a major overhaul of the player control schemes. Astonia takes you back to the roots of 2d-isometric C-RPG classics, featuring oldschool RPG mechanics such as custamizable characters, a high variety of complex spells, skills, professions, complicated storylines / quests and an intricate PVP system, set in a rich high fantasy world with steam-punk elements. Discover the Astonian Empire as a battle hardened warrior, a mage or a warrior/mage hybrid. As you progress in the game, you are able to customize your character, collect various artifacts and enchantments, and customize your gear to pick the perfect strategy to beat your foes. Besides the usual aspects of an MMORPG, Astonia offers highly customizable characters and puts an emphasis on player cooperation. Fair warning: this classic RPG comes together with oldschool 2d graphics. This game is absolutely free to play, with no option to subscribe or donate.
Meta Title: Astonia Remastered: Feb 18, 2020, A:TroY and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Astonia Remastered? Check out the release date (Feb 18, 2020), developer insights from A:TroY, and a complete game summary.
